Key Match Events: Argentina claimed a 3-0 home win over Chile thanks to second-half goals from Alexis Mac Allister, Julian Alvarez, and Paulo Dybala.
Liverpool midfielder Mac Allister scored three minutes after the break off a cross from Alvarez.
Julian Alvarez scored a long-range effort in the 84th minute.
Substitute Paulo Dybala found the net in stoppage time to seal the victory.
Post-Match Reflections: The Copa America champions looked dominant and untroubled by the absence of talismans Lionel Messi and Angel Di Maria.
Angel Di Maria received a tribute at the Monumental stadium after his international retirement.
Others: Argentina will play at Colombia in a rematch of the Copa America final on Tuesday.
Chile hosts Bolivia, who beat Venezuela earlier on Thursday.
